loadcommands.description: Load all the slash commands and upload it to Discord

autoCrosspost.description: Turn auto crosspost new messages in news channel on or off

notes.notNewsChannels: This shit only works in news channels

autoThreads.description: Turn auto create threads on new messages in news channel on or off

on.durationDescription: Auto Archive Duration in minutes, (default: instantly)
on.auto_deleteDescription: True: Delete the thread automatically when deleting the parent message, False: off
on.maxNames: Thread names must be under 16 charactars
on.premiumTier: autoArchiveDuration above 24 hours only available for guilds with tier 2 and above
